actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that public works projects of the Army Corps of Engineers in areas of high unemployment shall utilize not less than 40 percent local workers.

summary.text: Requires that contracts for Army Corps of Engineers public works projects in high unemployment areas include a provision that at least 40 percent of persons employed thereunder be local workers.

titles.title: A bill to provide that public works projects of the Army Corps of Engineers in areas of high unemployment shall utilize not less than 40 percent local workers.
